reviewText: Wonderful pirate themed show for the young pirate in the family or for the young at heart that enjoy pirates and/or animation. Light comedy with a large dose of PIRATES!
My 4 year old grandson loves pirates.  I purchased this movie for his 4th birthday and he LOVES it!  Great seller, great prices, fast shipping. Excellent transaction!!

Wanted to buy this item to help my daughter study German. Product details clearly state that DVD languages are English and GERMAN. Received DVD with English and Spanish. This item is going back to seller.
Bought this film for my son's 5th b-day. What a cute movie!!! Recommended for all kids and their families.

We picked up this movie about two-years ago, and my ten-year-old son still loves it!  We've been hoping there might be a sequel -- we haven't found one yet.  None the less, we highly recommend this film!  Great movie! Fun sound track!  (If anyone from Mosaik reads this, please make a sequel -- and include Archinbaldo and Prado again!)
My four year old loves pirates.  He watches this one over and over.  We own just about all others available......this is his favorite.
